Name: Background colors

Scripts.Name: Title screen background color
Scripts.Description:
Modify the title screen background color (Default: 0001).

NOTE: The original Super Mario 64 title screen seems to have some sort of black background in the model itself, so this will only take effect if you import a custom title screen.

Scripts.Name: Star select background color
Scripts.Description: Modify the star select background color (Default: FFFF).

Description:
Background colors are RGBA16 and is stored as 2 bytes (16 bits) 

Save a 1 x 1 pixel that is the color you want of the background as a .tga and drag it into this program: http://www.mediafire.com/file/yxutn3gn8bl316p/tga2rgba16.exe



Open the file you get from it up in a hex editor and you should get 2 bytes (16 bits). 

These are in RGBA16 so all you have to do now is use the tweak and input them.
